name: Balance board
description: Knowing how to balance is an important life skill. It takes years of experience to learn. But no! You can practice on a balance board. You stand up and learn how to balance. When that becomes easy for you, you make it more difficult - roll a ball through a built-in labyrinth. And by adding dumbbells for weight, you turn board exercises into a full-fledged workout.
suits: Dimensions of children's balance board: height from the floor - 5.5 cm, circle diameter - 27 cm, maximum length - 35.5 cm.
Dimensions of an adult balance board: height from the floor - 7 cm, diameter - 40.5 cm, maximum length - 53.5 cm.
The set includes: balance board, ball, storage case, exercise booklet.
